segments.text: Jared , I just heard about your father . How is he doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's in the hospital resting . The doctor's didn't give a clear answer yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so sorry to hear that . But this is a good hospital . I'm sure they will do whatever they can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must feel really worried right now . But you know your dad is a fighter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I think my mom is the most worried . I'm basically worried about how she is doing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's in the hospital with my dad . I have to go back tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . Let's go right after dinner .
segments.speaker: S2
